title: Boosting Optical Character Recognition: A Super-Resolution Approach
authors: C Dong, X Zhu, Y Deng, CC Loy, Y Qiao - arXiv preprint arXiv:1506.02211
excerpt: Abstract: Text image super-resolution is a challenging yet open research problem in the computer vision community. In particular, low-resolution images hamper the performance of typical optical character recognition (OCR) systems. In this article, we summarize our entry  ...

title: Compression Artifacts Reduction by a Deep Convolutional Network
authors: C Dong, Y Deng, CC Loy, X Tang - arXiv preprint arXiv:1504.06993
excerpt: Abstract: Lossy compression introduces complex compression artifacts, particularly the blocking artifacts, ringing effects and blurring. Existing algorithms either focus on removing blocking artifacts and produce blurred output, or restores sharpened images that are  ...
